#summary Detailed use case.

= Details =

Actors: Content Distributor, Database

  # Content Distributor selects a file which is to have it's sponsored status modified.
  # Client opens connection with database, queries the sponsored status of the selected file.
  # Content Distributor is given the option to modify this status.
  # If changed, the new status is committed to the database.
  # Client closes connection to database.
